english.segment1: what to say lord it's. you who gave me life. and i can't explain. just how much you mean to me. now that you have saved me lord. i give all that i am to you. that every day i can. be a light that shines your name
english.segment2: every day lord. i'll learn to stand upon your word. and i pray that i might. come to know you more. won't you guide me in. every single step i take and. every day i will. be your light unto the world
english.segment3: every day it's you i live for. every day i'll follow after you. every day i'll walk with you my lord
english.segment4: it's you i live for every day. it's you i live for every day. it's you i live for every day
